markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Magical Gear](/Rules.aspx?ID=245)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 293 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The items on Table 6–12 are the magic items from Chapter 11 that a 1st-level character could most frequently access. The descriptions below are incomplete; the items’ full entries appear in Chapter 11 on the pages listed in the table. Your GM might allow you to start with other magic items from Chapter 11 on a case-by-case basis.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-246" />

<document level="2" id="rules-247" />

<document level="2" id="rules-248" />

<document level="2" id="rules-249" />
name: Magical Gear
